title: Gait asymmetrical evaluation of lower limb amputees using wearable inertial sensors
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Hafiz Farhan Maqbool, Imran Mahmood, Ahmad Ali, Nadeem Iqbal, Jin-Taek Seong, Abbas Ali Dehghani-Sanij, Sundas Naji Alaziz, Mohammed Ibrahim Awad
